name: default-scss-js-project
description: Starter project with creative coding experiments using SCSS and JS.

scripts.compile: node-sass --include-path scss src/scss/style.scss css/style.css --output-style expanded && node-sass --include-path scss src/scss/style.scss css/style.min.css --output-style compressed && autoprefixer-cli -o css/style.css css/style.css && autoprefixer-cli -o css/style.min.css css/style.min.css
scripts.build: npm run compile && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js

author: Ond≈ôej Vitula
